main.title: HuaWei Atlas 800
main.text: Tailored toward AI developers and data researchers, Huawei Atlas 800 provides end-to-end capabilities for data labeling, model generation, model training, and model inference services. With integrated software and hardware, this appliance reduces the technical entry requirements for AI applications and enables quick development and rollout of AI services for customers.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model

power_node: 4 hot-swappable 2,200W AC or 240V HVDC PSUs, with support for N+N redundancy
fan_node: 6 hot-swappable fan modules, with support for N+1 redundancy
io_node: 4 x PCIe x16 LP + 2 x 10 GE LOM
